title: Trump Endorses J.D. Vance in Republican Primary for Senate in Ohio

sentence: The paper added, Trump received so many calls that he stopped taking them Friday.? In addition to the GOP primaries in Ohio and Pennsylvania, Trump's image is also on the line in Georgia, where he has endorsed gubernatorial candidate David Perdue, who is trailing incumbent Brian Kemp.
title: Trump's Endorsement of J.D. Vance Worries Advisers Who Fear He's Backing Losers
